meaning_str.bing:
n. 艺人；大师；美术家(如画家,雕塑家等)
网络. 艺术家；依艺人；美工

艺人；大师；美术家(如画家,雕塑家等)

艺术家；（尤指）画家；美术家；文学艺术家；表演艺术家

1.en: Backstage, the band's front man explained that he was an artist before he got to "American Idol. "
1.cn: 乐队的主唱解释说，在他加入美国偶像之前，他只是一个艺术家。

2.en: Always looking to challenge himself as an artist, Cartoon has carved himself a place in corporate logo design and branding.
2.cn: 作为艺术家他不断挑战自我，开创了自己的商标和品牌。

3.en: Woody's response was that an artist has to follow his own intuition, rather than obey some huckster driven by readership surveys.
3.cn: 伍迪的反应是，一个艺术家必须按照自己的直觉创作，而不能屈服于那些被阅读率调查驱使的商人们。

0.en: Joey, it's Anne Geddes. She's a famous artist.
0.cn: 那是安妮·格迪斯的作品（澳大利亚的儿童摄影大师），她是名艺术家。

1.en: Not everyone can become a great artist, but a great artist can come from anywhere.
1.cn: 并非是谁都能成为伟大的艺术家，不过伟大的艺术家却可能来自任何角落。

2.en: Fine, make fun of me. I am a serious artist who belongs in Paris.
2.cn: 你就尽管取笑我吧，我是身属巴黎的艺术家。

3.en: She spent three hundred dollars on art supplies. You're not an artist.
3.cn: 她花了三百块买艺术用品。你又不是艺术家。

4.en: Look I don't know this baby. I don't know if she's a famous artist or not.
4.cn: 我不认识这个宝宝，我不知道她是不是名艺术家。

5.en: It's a work of surrealism, Riley. It's how this artist's mind views the subject.
5.cn: 这叫超现实主义，莱丽，艺术家透过物体表面看到深刻内涵并表达出来。

6.en: Because you'll never be a true artist unless you're true to yourself. So, who are you?
6.cn: 因为你不能诚实地对待自己，就不能成为一个真正的艺术家，所以，你是谁？

7.en: Now, you're always carrying this notebook around. You obviously fancy yourself as an artist.
7.cn: 现在，你总是随身带着你这个笔记本，显然你把自己想象成了一个艺术家。

8.en: May seem like a strange word to be in that document but he was sort of... He was an artist.
8.cn: 这个词出现在"独立宣言"中，似乎有些怪异，但是他似乎是，是个艺术家。

9.en: Really? Like what? Well, okay, you're a, you're a talented artist, you own your own business.
9.cn: 真的? 比如说? 好吧你看，你是个才华横溢的艺术家，你有自己的事业。

10.en: Do you know what I used to do before I had you? Art. I wanted to be an artist when I grew up.
10.cn: 你知道我生你之前是做什么的吗？搞艺术的。我小时候的理想是当一名艺术家。

11.en: It's because you're an artist. I'm glad you decided to display your work. I got your note in my teacher's box.
11.cn: 是因为你是一名艺术家，我很高兴你决定展示你的画，我收到了你的纸条。

12.en: You don't listen to a word I say, do you? It's not because I'm disrespectful. It's because you're an artist.
12.cn: 我说的话你一句都没听。对吧？不是因为我对你不尊重，是因为你是一名艺术家。

13.en: Hi, Rachel. Hi. Love your new nose. Jack. Dr. Wolfson's an artist. He removed my mole cluster. Want to see?
13.cn: 瑞秋，你的新鼻子真漂亮。杰克。威尔森医生是个艺术家，他帮我点掉一堆痣，你要看吗？

14.en: Of course she meant to. Maya does what Maya wants. Maya does what Maya wants because she's a true artist.
14.cn: 她当然是故意的，玛雅画的都是她内心所想，玛雅画她的内心所想因为她是一名真正的艺术家。

15.en: Well, there's a bit of every artist in their work. But I was locked in a sterile chamber at 8 so if I wanted to see the world, I had to imagine it.
15.cn: 每个艺术家的作品都有自己的痕迹。我从八岁开始就被关在这了所以我只能想象外面的世界是什么样子。

16.en: Talked some sense into that boyfriend of yours. Lance is an artist, but I wouldn't expect you to understand that. You're right. I don't understand that at all.
16.cn: 你和你的男朋友沟通好了吗？兰斯是个艺术家，其实我并不指望你能够理解他。没错，我确实理解不了他。

17.en: As many of you know, recently Massimo Corteleoni has agreed to finance the expansion of the James Holt label transforming the work of this visionary artist into a global brand, which is really an exciting enterprise.
17.cn: 正如大部分人所知最近马西莫·科特利让内决定为詹姆斯·浩特这个品牌注资，将这位富于创造灵感的艺术家的作品转变成一个全球品牌，一个振奋人心的产业。

18.en: Oh my gosh. See? I am an artist. I am finally something. Maya. What a life I'm having.
18.cn: 我的天哪，看见没，我是艺术家，货真价实的。玛雅。我悲催的人生啊。

19.en: Real inspiration has no hours. A true artist knows that.
19.cn: 灵感随时会来，真正的画家才懂。
